scripts.test_m1: env M1_LOG_LEVEL=error mocha test/m1/m1.js > m1.results || true && env M1_LOG_LEVEL=debug mocha test/m1/m1.js > m1.debug || true && echo Done, check m1.results for test results, check m1.debug for verbose logs
scripts.test_m3: env mocha test/m3/m3.js > m3.results || true && env M3_LOG_LEVEL=1 mocha test/m3/m3.js > m3.debug || true && echo Done, check m3.results for test results, check m3.debug for verbose logs
scripts.test_m5: env mocha test/m5/m5.js > m5.results || true && env M5_LOG_LEVEL=1 mocha test/m5/m5.js > m5.debug || true && echo Done, check m5.results for test results, check m5.debug for verbose logs
